items.description_en: Shoots an arrow made of water at the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 向目标敌人射出水箭

items.description_en: Increases water amplify and resistance for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的水系增幅和抗性

items.description_en: Gains elemental thorns temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时获得元素反伤

items.description_en: Greatly increases physical damage temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加物理伤害

items.description_en: Cleaves all enemies
items.description_zh: 劈砍所有敌人

items.description_en: Slashes all enemies and reduce their damage
items.description_zh: 斩击所有敌人，并减少其伤害

items.description_en: Increases critical rate for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的暴击率

items.description_en: Greatly increases elemental damage temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加元素伤害

items.description_en: Greatly increases evasion temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加闪避

items.description_en: Entangles the targeted enemy, dealing damage with chance to stun
items.description_zh: 缠绕目标敌人，造成伤害并有几率使其眩晕

items.description_en: Increases physical amplify and armor for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的物理增幅和护甲

items.description_en: Casts a fireball at the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人施放火球

items.description_en: Casts a firestorm at all enemies
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人施放火焰风暴

items.description_en: Shoots a flaming arrow at the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 向目标敌人射出火焰箭

items.description_en: Increases fire amplify and resistance for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的火系增幅和抗性

items.description_en: Casts a flame blast at all enemies
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人施放熔岩爆裂

items.description_en: Attacks all enemies, dealing damage and increases their damage taken
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人造成伤害，并增加其所受伤害

items.description_en: Greatly increases attack speed temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加攻击速度

items.description_en: Casts frost surge at all enemies, dealing damage and reducing evasion
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人施放冰霜爆裂,造成伤害并减少闪避

items.description_en: Casts heal on yourself
items.description_zh: 对自己施放治疗术

items.description_en: Casts an ice spear at the targeted enemy, dealing damage and reducing attack speed
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人投掷冰矛，造成伤害并降低其攻击速度

items.description_en: Impales the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 刺穿目标敌人

items.description_en: Increases damage, attack speed, and cast speed temporarily at the cost of HP
items.description_zh: 以HP为代价，临时增加伤害、攻击速度和施法速度

items.description_en: Tremendously increases armor, resistances, and tenacity temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时极大增加护甲、抗性和韧性

items.description_en: Drains the life force of the targeted enemy, dealing damage and healing the caster
items.description_zh: 吸取目标敌人的生命力，造成伤害并治疗自己

items.description_en: Maims the targeted enemy and causes bleeding
items.description_zh: 划伤目标敌人，并使其流血

items.description_en: Casts mana spring at all enemies, dealing damage and increasing ally MP regeneration
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人释放法力喷泉，造成伤害并增加友方MP恢复

items.description_en: Casts minor heal on yourself
items.description_zh: 对自己施放初级治疗术

items.description_en: Cast's a veil over all enemies, dealing damage with a chance to blind
items.description_zh: 给所有敌人蒙上一层菌幕，造成伤害并有几率使其失明

items.description_en: Shoots the targeted enemy. On each successful hit, will pierce and hit the next enemy
items.description_zh: 射击目标敌人，如果命中，则贯穿并射向下一个敌人

items.description_en: Strikes the targeted enemy. On each successful hit, will pierce and hit the next enemy.
items.description_zh: 刺向目标敌人，如果命中，则贯穿并刺向下一个敌人

items.description_en: Shoots the targeted enemy, dealing damage and decreasing regeneration
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人射击，并减少HP/MP恢复

items.description_en: Pokes the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 戳向目标敌人

items.description_en: Greatly increases accuracy temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加精准

items.description_en: Promotes a pawn
items.description_zh: 晋升一个小兵

items.description_en: Tremendously increases threat rating
items.description_zh: 极大地增加威胁等级

items.description_en: Punctures the targeted enemy's armor, dealing damage and temporarily reducing its armor
items.description_zh: 击破目标敌人的护甲，造成伤害并临时降低其护甲

items.description_en: Casts heal on the ally with the lowest HP percentage
items.description_zh: 对HP%最低的队友施放治疗术

items.description_en: Takes a quick shot at the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人进行快速射击

items.description_en: Shoots a rain of arrows on all enemies
items.description_zh: 向所有敌人射出箭雨

items.description_en: Heals all allies
items.description_zh: 治疗所有队友

items.description_en: Revives a dead ally
items.description_zh: 复活一位死亡的队友

items.description_en: Scratches the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 抓伤目标敌人

items.description_en: Bashes the targeted enemy with a shield, dealing extra damage based on attacker's armor
items.description_zh: 盾击目标敌人

items.description_en: Takes a shot at the targeted enemy, temporarily silencing them
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人射击，并使其沉默

items.description_en: Smacks the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 猛击目标敌人

items.description_en: Casts a smoke burst at the targeted enemy, dealing damage and decreasing their accuracy
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人释放烟爆灭影，造成伤害并减少精准

items.description_en: Increases attack speed and cast speed for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的攻击速度和施法速度

items.description_en: Gains physical thorns temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时获得物理反伤

items.description_en: Takes a shot at the targeted enemy with greatly enhanced accuracy
items.description_zh: 以极高的精准对目标敌人进行射击

items.description_en: Smashes the targeted enemy and has a chance to stun
items.description_zh: 重锤目标敌人，并有几率使其眩晕

items.description_en: Performs a sweeping attack on all enemies
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人进行横扫攻击

items.description_en: Increases nature amplify and resistance for all allies
items.description_zh: 增加所有队友的自然系增幅和抗性

items.description_en: Greatly increases threat rating
items.description_zh: 大幅增加威胁等级

items.description_en: Greatly increases armor and resistances temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时大幅增加护甲和抗性

items.description_en: Casts toxic pollen at all enemies, dealing damage and decreasing armor and resistances
items.description_zh: 对所有敌人施放剧毒粉尘，造成伤害并减少护甲和魔抗

items.description_en: Gains lifesteal temporarily
items.description_zh: 临时获得生命偷取

items.description_en: Casts a water strike at the targeted enemy
items.description_zh: 对目标敌人使用流水冲击
